Constructor Detail

Position

public Position(double x,
                double y)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Initialize this new position with the given x- and y-coordinates.

Parameters:
x - The x-coordinate for this new position.
y - The y-coordinate for this new position.
Postconditions:
  • The new x-coordinate for this position is equal to the given x-coordinate.
        new.getX() == x
  • The new y-coordinate for this position is equal to the given y-coordinate.
        new.getY() == y
    • Throws:
    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given x-coordinate is not a valid x-coordinate for any position.
        ! isValidX(x)
    java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given y-coordinate is not a valid y-coordinate for any position.
        ! isValidY(y)

    Check whether the given x-coordinate is a valid x-coordinate for any position.

    Parameters:
    x - The x-coordinate to check.
    Returns:
    True if and only if the given x-coordinate is a number.

    distance

    public double distance(Position other)
    Return the distance between this position and another position.

    Parameters:
    other - The position to which the distance will be calculated.
    Returns:

        Math.sqrt(Math.pow(this.getX()-other.getX(),2)+               Math.pow(this.getY()-other.getY(),2))
